name: One Life (itch)
description:
One Life is a game where you survive as long as possible.

Beat up trees for apples, drink water from a pond and beat your hunger and thirst because you only have one life.

This game has only been in development for six hours, but it's somewhat playable.

Expect a lot of changes, I plan on making a full release and updating this throughout the development process.

  • Crafting and other features are soon to come.
